metadata.title: DevFest Ogbomoso
metadata.description: DevFest Ogbomoso is a community-run, developer event that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon, and more.

throwback.title: Throwback to DevFest '23: Vibes and Tech All the Way
throwback.subtitle: Remember the energy? The pictures, the jollof, the pure tech vibes? Last year, we turned up and showed out. From inspiring sessions to unforgettable connections, DevFest 2023 was everything and more.

speakers.name: Adejoke Haastrup
speakers.title: Creating Developer-Centric Content: How to Write for a Technical Audience
speakers.description: This session will focus on the nuances of writing for developers, including tips on simplifying complex concepts, structuring technical tutorials, and using code snippets effectively.
speakers.bio: Adejoke Haastrup is a Developer Advocate at Google, where she focuses on helping developers build scalable applications. She has a background in computer science and has been working in the tech industry for over 10 years.

speakers.name: Adeyanju Michael
speakers.title: Building Resilient APIs: Strategies for Handling API Attacks
speakers.description: This session will focus on the nuances of writing for developers, including tips on simplifying complex concepts, structuring technical tutorials, and using code snippets effectively.
speakers.bio: Adeyanju Michael is a Software Engineer at Facebook, where he focuses on building scalable and reliable APIs. He has a background in computer science and has been working in the tech industry for over 10 years.

speakers.name: Anita Ihuman
speakers.title: Leveling up the Kubernetes Development Experience with Remocal development
speakers.description: This session will focus on the nuances of writing for developers, including tips on simplifying complex concepts, structuring technical tutorials, and using code snippets effectively.
speakers.bio: Anita Ihuman is a Machine Learning Engineer at Google, where she focuses on building scalable and reliable APIs. She has a background in computer science and has been working in the tech industry for over 10 years.

speakerSection.title: Meet the DevFest Ogbomoso 2024 Speakers
speakerSection.subtitle: We've raised the bar this year with our impressive lineup of speakers, each prepared to share valuable insights on different aspects of the tech community.

schedule.title: Options For Everyone
schedule.subtitle: At DevFest Ogbomoso 2024, we're serving up a full menu of talks and sessions to match every taste. No matter what you're into, there's something for you.

community.title: GDG Ogbomoso
community.subtitle: A community-led tech conference bringing together developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts.

faqs.question: What is DevFest Ogbomoso?
faqs.answer: DevFest Ogbomoso is a community-led developer conference focused on community building and learning about Google's technologies.

faqs.question: When and where is it happening?
faqs.answer: DevFest Ogbomoso 2024 will take place on November 15-16, 2024, at the Landmark Event Center, Ogbomoso.

faqs.question: Who can attend?
faqs.answer: DevFest is open to anyone interested in technology, from students to professional developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts.

faqs.question: What should I bring?
faqs.answer: Bring your laptop, charger, and an open mind ready to learn and connect with fellow developers!
